com.phunware.engagement.internal.network

Interface NetworkManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NetworkManagerImpl

    public NetworkManager

    Responsible for all web API calls to the Engagement backend. Shared by all externally-facing managers. All network requests should be executed on a background thread and call back to the callback on the the thread that it was originally called from. Constructor should take in the necessary parameters for the Network Manager to store its own authentication information and configuration information shared by all web calls

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addResponseHandler()
      On each Event call, all response handlers will be passed the returned EventPayload for appropriate handling
      void getAttributeMetadata()
      Fetches all attribute metadata
      void getProfileAttributes()
      Fetches all profile attributes associated with the current device
      boolean removeResponseHandler()
      Removes a response handler so it will no longer receive event payloads.
      void sendDeviceDeregistrationEvent()
      Deregister device Should occur when configuration changes (not when initial configuration set) Subsequent registration can't happen until deregistration is complete
      void sendDeviceRegKey()
      Separate api to send GCM/FCM registration key Should only happen on initial installation, change in version or build number, device identifier change, or SDK version change
      void sendDeviceRegistrationEvent()
      Register device Should only happen on initial installation, change in version or build number, device identifier change, or SDK version change
      void sendDownloadGeofencesEvent()
      Sent when the device would like to download geofences Should only occur when the device has not sent an event to the server in more than 1 week
      void sendDownloadPromotionEvent()
      Sent when the client receives a remote notification
      void sendGeofenceEntryEvent()
      Sends geofence entry events to server
      void sendGeofenceExitEvent()
      Sends geofence exit events to server
      void sendStaticId()
      Sent when the client chooses to send static identifier
      void updateProfileAttribute()
      Updates specified Profile attribute

    • Method Detail

      • addResponseHandler

        void addResponseHandler()

        On each Event call, all response handlers will be passed the returned EventPayload for appropriate handling

      • removeResponseHandler

        boolean removeResponseHandler()

        Removes a response handler so it will no longer receive event payloads.

        Returns:
        true if handler was successfully removed, false if handler was not in the manager's list of handlers
